definition[0]: the regular exchange of information between groups of people, especially at work, so that each group knows what the other is doing
example[0]: close liaison between the army and police
example[2]: The project has been set up in liaison with the art department.
definition[1]: someone whose job is to talk to different departments or groups and to tell each of them about what the others are doing
example[3]: Renee Ball, liaison to the State Parks Authority
definition[2]: a secret sexual relationship between a man and a woman, especially a man and a woman who are married but not to each other
